caption: The guy was wiper nice and polite, I always appreciate good customer service! It’s located inside whole food don’t look for an outdoor sign!
I ordered the mushroom bacon plnt burger and it was delicious, and on top of that the staff were friendly. Overall good food and good experience.
The man at the front was super helpful. He told me to download the app I got$5 off! Food was great too.

The customer service was great, but I was disappointed in the Chicken Funguy as I couldn't bite through the meat. I dont know if it wasnt fresh, but it wouldn't break off. I was already on the road and out of the area to turn back. I will not try it again.
The Cheeseburger was interestingly good.
I had the plant cheeseburger and WOW it was AMAZING!! Makes going vegan worth while!!!

Charlie is a very honest man! Terry is also kind with his words! The gentleman took my order as they were packing up to close. I was having a very rough night but they made me want celebrate my upcoming Birthday with an even bigger smile because they kept a smile on my face. Now that! Is excellent customer service :D. Definitely eat from PLNT Burger food was also amazing!!
My god my god Delicious wow I haven’t eating a regular burger in two years you can tell the diff a lil bit but it’s much lighter and just over all good I’ll defiantly be going back

Okay another plant based burger spot. This  place was bomb. First off though if you are going to a DC restaurant expect to have to hunt for a parking spot and possibly pay. In this particular one it is inside in Whole Foods (it was not mentioned in the directions).  Secondly, due to covid-19 it's best to place the order online. I would recommend it. But I believe you can still go there and place an order without online orders.  Now about the food. The plant based burger is getting better and as more restaurants present these items it just gets better. I got the family deal. 4 burgers, 4 fries, 4 drinks and 4 cookies. I added the sauces too. Now I'm not lying that was some good food.  The burgers and I can't stress it enough you will not miss the meet. The sweet potato fries and regular fries are crisp. The food is fulfilling and not overwhelming. What I mean is that you don't feel bad afterwards. I recommend getting a small meal. It's enough food unless you are super hungry.  So try this spot out. The one on H street SE is in Whole Foods. I'm sure the other ones are good too. Right now there's a Groupon for the food.

I tried this as a non-vegan. Something I would eat every now and again. Had the cheeseburger and fries, and for my first time trying *Beyond meat, I didn't hate it, but didn't fall in love either. So considering, I vote give it a try! There's a deal for the rest of January so give it a go!

The best vegan fast food ever and the best customer service. I come here at least once a month and I am never disappointed. I also want to make note that I had placed a thanksgiving meal during the holidays and for some unexplained reason, my order never went through and I didn’t find out until the day before. Being the only vegan in my family, I was upset at the thought of not having anything to eat. I decided to call and I spoke with Mike who assured me I would have a meal available the next day. Thank you Mike and thank you PLNT Burger, I will be a customer for life.

One of the most amazing service I have ever experienced! The staff was super professional, Mike asked me if I had ever tried the chili which I didn’t and offered me a sample and it was amazing! Charles walked me through how I could save $5 by downloading the app! Overall amazing experience and great food!

I had the mushroom bacon BBQ burger. It’s a Beyond Meat burger, with plant based cheddar, mushroom “bacon” and French onions. It was tasty. The BBQ sauce was so overpowering that it’s hard to tell what anything else tasted like. Overall the price is good, and the concept is interesting. Although it was all plant based, it didn’t feel especially healthy. I’m not sure if that is a good or bad thing. It’s worth trying once. I haven’t decided if I’ll go twice.

I don’t know if they were having an off night but I ordered from Uber eats and it was absolutely terrible.   I ended up throwing the shake and shroom sandwich in the trash.  I’m a longtime vegan and am really disappointed.

I love this place!! I travel a whole 45 mins just to get the food. I had bad experience yesterday, my order was all the way wrong! And I called first thing in the morning and spoke to the manager daquan and he was sooo nice and replaced my order and provided me with lunch for the next day.  THE FOOD IS DELICIOUS & GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
The Crispy Chik n Funguy Sandwich, herbed fries and herbed sauce hit the spot!!!!
So so so good!!! Everything is extremely flavorful and delicious!
Amazing. Everything amazing. Cheeseburger, insane fries, sauces, sir kensington ketchup and the chocolate soft serve. So good
The food here is delicious and the customer service is top notch too. I accidentally sent my order to the wrong location and the cashier fixed the mistake, no questions asked. Highly recommend!
I got the plnt burger with sweet potato fries, it was so good. Im definitely going to order again from them
Tastes great and everything on the menu is 100% vegan!!

I wish i took photos sorry yall. It was sooooo Good . I crushed! I ordered the Chikn Funguy sandwich wrapped in Swiss Chard, A PLNTY Meal (burger) with bloomies and mandarin cardamom juice, and a large crispy herb fries. I was determined to try a little bit of each thing that they offered. It was AMAZING!! IAM NOT A VEGAN but I am making better food choices for me and my family. They had no idea they were eating a fully plant based meal. They throughly enjoyed. I ordered through doordash. I will ABSOLUTELY 💯.  Visit the restaurant so I could eat the food hot next time. Thats right I enjoyed my meal so much and it wasn't even hot.
